name: Skiing Adventure VR: Steep Extreme Challenge
name_original: Skiing Adventure VR: Steep Extreme Challenge
description:
Ski Adventure VR is a fast paced extreme Sports game, where you will have to complete various challenges to prove to the world that you are the best when it comes to dangerous skiing challenges. Expect to travel at a blistering speed on an unforgiving terrain filled with dangerous obstacles that will crush your bones if you don’t avoid them.
There is no margin for error at the speed at which you will be skiing. Avoiding all obstacles that come in your path is the only option you have. The extreme wintery conditions will make your job even harder on this dangerous mountain.
How to play:
+ Have to achieve the objectives
+ The objectives can be - covering the distance or catching the flags...
+ Beware of upcoming pine trees and stones... which will affect your health

KEY FEATURES:
+ Optimized controls for the best VR experience
+ Extreme weather conditions
+ Full body awareness, so the player character reacts to your head movements
